tools.name: Voddio
tools.jt_what: This app allows you to record, edit, send and distribute video.
tools.jt_why: It takes time to learn how to use it properly but lots of tutorials available on-line.

tools.name: FilMiCPro
tools.jt_what: Shoot, edit, voice and share professional quality video, full manual controls and ability to monitor audio through headphones while recording.
tools.jt_why: If you want to shoot like a pro...with your iphone.

tools.name: Videolicious
tools.jt_what: Select your photos or video and record yourself describing them to create a quick montage.
tools.jt_why: Produce, cut, edit, and a story in minutes.

tools.name: Splice
tools.jt_why: Create videos and slideshows, no length limits, watermarks, or ads. Free filters, songs, sound effects, text overlays, transitions, and precise editing tools.

tools.name: Tout
tools.jt_what: Quickly publish vidoe content to multiple platforms including social media sites.
tools.jt_why: Easy to sign up and use, offers video tutorials.

tools.name: Periscope
tools.jt_what: Live stream video from your mobile device.
tools.jt_why: Your point of view has never been so easy to share.

tools.name: iMovie
tools.jt_what: Edit on a timeline or storyboard-based interface for splicing, trimming, and editing, easy to upload to iCloud
tools.jt_why: Easy to use and many tutorials available on-line.

tools.name: Vidtrim Pro
tools.jt_what: Video editor and organiser for Android.
tools.jt_why: It includes multiple features like trimming, merging, frame grabbing, video effects, extract audio.

tools.name: Vee for Video
tools.jt_what: Vee allows you to shoot videos at up to 1080p and with variable frame rates, and then quickly move your video clips into editing.
tools.jt_why: High-quality video shooting and editing all within a single app.

tools.name: Cinema FV-5
tools.jt_what: Similar to Filmic Pro but for Android devices, allows manual control of video/audio settings.
tools.jt_why: Puts professional manual controls at your Droid-held fingertips.
